  • Method Details

    • getDeleteRequestStatus

      public IndexApi.GetDeleteRequestStatusAdapter getDeleteRequestStatus(String hrn, String layerID, String deleteId, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Returns the details of the specified delete request. Delete request can be in one of the following states: Scheduled, Processing, Failed, Succeeded. See Data API Developer&rsquo;s Guide in the Documentation section for the delete request state diagram.

      Path: /layers/{layerID}/deleteRequest/{deleteId}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : DeleteRequestStatus (Delete request status)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - The request is invalid. Verify and retry.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized - The credentials provided do not authorize the user to perform this operation.)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - The user is not authorized to perform the operation on the resource specified.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - The criteria set in the request are not valid.)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerID - The ID of the index layer you want to get the delete request status for.
      deleteId - Id of the delete request returned from the index delete operation.
      billingTag - Billing Tag is an optional free-form tag which is used for grouping billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • getDeleteRequestStatus

      public IndexApi.GetDeleteRequestStatusBuilder getDeleteRequestStatus()

    • getParts

      public IndexApi.GetPartsAdapter getParts(String hrn, String layerID, Integer numRequestedParts, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Returns a list of Part Ids which represent the layer parts that can be used to limit the scope of a query operation. This allows to run parallel queries with multiple parts. The user has to provide the desired number of parts and the service will return a list of Part Ids. Please note in some cases the requested number of parts will make them too small and in this case the service might return lesser amount of the parts than requested.

      Path: /layers/{layerID}/parts

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : PartsResponse (OK - Operation executed successfully)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - The request is invalid. Verify number of requested parts and retry.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized - The credentials provided do not authorize the user to perform this operation.)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - The user is not authorized to perform the query on the resource specified.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - A layer with the given name does not exist.)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerID - The ID of the index layer you want to query.
      numRequestedParts - Indicates requested number of layer parts.
      billingTag - Billing Tag is an optional free-form tag which is used for grouping billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • getParts

      public IndexApi.GetPartsBuilder getParts()

    • insertIndexes

      public IndexApi.InsertIndexesAdapter insertIndexes(String hrn, String layerID, List<com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.index.Index> index, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Adds index data for a given data blob to an index layer. For more information, see [Publish to an Index Layer](https://www.here.com/docs/bundle/data-api-developer-guide/page/rest/publishing-data-index.html).

      Path: /layers/{layerID}

      Method: POST

      Expected answers:

      code 201 : (OK - The index was successfully created.)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - The request is invalid. Verify and retry.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized - The credentials can't be authenticated by the system.)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - The user is not authorized to create indexes.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - A layer with the given name does not exist. )

      code 409 : (Conflict - An index with the given ID already exists.)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerID - The layer ID of the index layer.
      index - An array of index attributes and values to be inserted.
      billingTag - Billing Tag is an optional free-form tag which is used for grouping billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • insertIndexes

      public IndexApi.InsertIndexesBuilder insertIndexes()

    • performDelete

      public IndexApi.PerformDeleteAdapter performDelete(String hrn, String layerID, String deleteQuery, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Deletes the partitions that match the query in the index layer. Returns the delete request ID, which you can use to query the status of the delete operation.

      Path: /layers/{layerID}

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 202 : DeleteResponse (Accepted - Delete request accepted successfully)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - The request is invalid. Verify and retry.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized - The credentials provided do not authorize the user to perform this operation.)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - The user is not authorized to perform the query on the resource specified.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - The criteria set in the query is not valid.)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerID - The ID of the index layer you want to delete from.
      deleteQuery - An RSQL query to use to delete the partitions that match the query. For more information, see [Delete Index Data from an Index Layer](https://www.here.com/docs/bundle/data-api-developer-guide/page/rest/deleting-data-index.html). The query must use the indexing attributes defined in the index layer.
      billingTag - Billing Tag is an optional free-form tag which is used for grouping billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • performDelete

      public IndexApi.PerformDeleteBuilder performDelete()

    • performQuery

      public IndexApi.PerformQueryAdapter performQuery(String hrn, String layerID, String query, Optional<String> billingTag, Optional<String> part)
      Queries the index layer for the partitions that match the query. Returns each partition that matches the query, including each partition's data handle, which you use with the blob API to retrieve data for each partition.

      Path: /layers/{layerID}

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : DataResponse (OK - Query executed successfully)

      code 400 : (Bad Request - The request is invalid. Verify and retry.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized - The credentials provided do not authorize the user to perform this operation.)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - The user is not authorized to perform the query on the resource specified.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - The criteria set in the query is not valid.)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerID - The ID of the index layer you want to query.
      query - An RSQL query to use to retrieve partitions that match the query. For more information, see [Get Index Data from an Index Layer](https://www.here.com/docs/bundle/data-api-developer-guide/page/rest/getting-data-index.html). The query must use the indexing attributes defined in the index layer.
      billingTag - Billing Tag is an optional free-form tag which is used for grouping billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.
      part - Indicates which part of the layer shall be queried.

    • performQuery

      public IndexApi.PerformQueryBuilder performQuery()

    • performUpdate

      public IndexApi.PerformUpdateAdapter performUpdate(String hrn, String layerID, com.here.platform.data.client.base.generated.scaladsl.model.index.UpdateIndexRequest updateIndexRequest, Optional<String> billingTag)
      Modifies partitions in an index layer.

      Path: /layers/{layerID}

      Method: PUT

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : (OK - The index was successfully updated.)

      code 401 : (Unauthorized - The credentials provided do not authorize the user to perform this operation.)

      code 403 : (Forbidden - The user is not authorized to update the catalog and layer provided.)

      code 404 : (Not Found - A layer with the given name does not exist.)

      code 409 : (Conflict - An index with the given ID already exists)

      Parameters:
      hrn - The HERE Resource Name (HRN) of the catalog.
      layerID - The layer ID of the index layer.
      updateIndexRequest - Contains the data you want to add or remove from the index layer
      billingTag - Billing Tag is an optional free-form tag which is used for grouping billing records together. If supplied, it must be between 4 - 16 characters, contain only alpha/numeric ASCII characters [A-Za-z0-9]. Grouping billing records by billing tag will be available in future releases.

    • performUpdate

      public IndexApi.PerformUpdateBuilder performUpdate()

    • withConfig

      public IndexApi withConfig(ApiConfiguration apiConfig)
